Package tan.jerry.process_future_movement.config

Class BatchJobConfig

java.lang.Object
tan.jerry.process_future_movement.config.BatchJobConfig
@Configuration @EnableBatchProcessing public class BatchJobConfig extends Object
BatchJobConfig is a configuration class that sets up the Spring Batch job, steps, readers, processors, and writers for processing future movements.
